info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 12:00PM MST until July 30 at 3:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 300 PM MST. * At 1200 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over much of Hualapai Mountain. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hualapai Mountain Park, Hualapai Road and Dw Ranch Road. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
